mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.xuesheng_id as xueshengId ,a.liuyan_name as liuyanName ,a.liuyan_types as liuyanTypes ,a.liuyan_file as liuyanFile ,a.liuyan_content as liuyanContent ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.huifu_content as huifuContent ,a.update_time as updateTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,xuesheng.xuesheng_name as xueshengName ,xuesheng.xuesheng_phone as xueshengPhone ,xuesheng.xuesheng_id_number as xueshengIdNumber ,xuesheng.xuesheng_photo as xueshengPhoto ,xuesheng.xuesheng_email as xueshengEmail ,xuesheng.zhuanye_types as zhuanyeTypes ,xuesheng.banji_types as banjiTypes
FROM liuyan a left JOIN xuesheng xuesheng ON a.xuesheng_id = xuesheng.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.xuesheng_id = #{params.xueshengId} )
and a.liuyan_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.liuyanName},'%')
and a.liuyan_types = #{params.liuyanTypes}
and a.liuyan_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.liuyanContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.huifu_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.huifuContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeEnd})
and a.xuesheng_id IS NOT NULL
and xuesheng.xuesheng_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengName},'%')
and xuesheng.xuesheng_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengPhone},'%')
and xuesheng.xuesheng_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengIdNumber},'%')
and xuesheng.xuesheng_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengEmail},'%')
and xuesheng.zhuanye_types = #{params.zhuanyeTypes}
and xuesheng.banji_types = #{params.banjiTypes}
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
